content.question: Claes Oldenburg's choice of imagery in this work reflects which contemporary concern of the 1960s?

choices.label: Civil rights demonstrations and increasing racial tension
Environmental pollution caused by industrial chemicals
Protests against the Vietnam War on college campuses
Cultural changes that reaffirmed traditional family values

content.answer: Protests against the Vietnam War on college campuses

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
